description:
Momonosuke and Shinobu face Kaido while Kid and Law challenge Big Mom. Meanwhile, Nami, heading towards the stage on the Performance Floor along with Usopp and Tama, hears a strange voice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance`s Counterattack Begins!
Croyez en Luffy. La contre-attaque de l`alliance !
Glaubt an Ruffy! – Die Allianz holt zum Gegenschlag aus!
Luffy o Shinjiro! Doumei Hangeki Kaishi!
Верить в Луффи! Начало контратаки альянса!
ルフィを信じろ! 同盟反撃開始!
